$:/kookma/livenote/macros/livenote.text:
\define livenote(tidName)
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/livenote/data/$tidName$" field="text" placeholder="Start writting ..." default="" class="note"/>
\end
$:/kookma/livenote/macros/livenote.title: $:/kookma/livenote/macros/livenote
$:/kookma/livenote/macros/livenote.creator: Mohammad

$:/kookma/livenote/macros/newTitle.text:
\define newTitle() <<now YYYY.0MM.0DD>>-{{{[[0]add[$(inc)$]addprefix[0000]split[]last[3]join[]]}}} 

\define newTiddler(n:0)
<$set name="inc" value={{{ [<__n__>add[1]] }}}>
<$wikify name="myTitle" text="<<newTitle>>" >
<$list filter="[<myTitle>] +[!has[title]]" 
emptyMessage=""" <$macrocall $name="newTiddler" n=<<inc>> /> """>
<$action-createtiddler 
$basetitle=<<myTitle>> 
$savetitle="$:/temp/livenote/title"
tags="livenote" 
/>
</$list>
<$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/livenote/title}} />
</$wikify>
</$set>
\end
$:/kookma/livenote/macros/newTitle.title: $:/kookma/livenote/macros/newTitle
$:/kookma/livenote/macros/newTitle.creator: Mohammad

$:/kookma/livenote/stylesheets/button.title: $:/kookma/livenote/stylesheets/button
$:/kookma/livenote/stylesheets/button.creator: Mohammad

$:/kookma/livenote/stylesheets/paper.title: $:/kookma/livenote/stylesheets/paper

$:/kookma/livenote/template/viewtemplate.text: \define create-new-livenote() <$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink livenote-btn" tooltip="create new livenote"> {{$:/core/images/new-journal-button}} \end <$list filter="[all[current]tag[livenote]]"> <> <$macrocall $name=livenote tidName=<> />
$:/kookma/livenote/template/viewtemplate.title: $:/kookma/livenote/template/viewtemplate
$:/kookma/livenote/template/viewtemplate.creator: Mohammad
